author: rjung
msg: Fix localized message format which was forgotten in r918741.
when backporting r891304/r904855 from TC 6.0.x to TC 5.5.x.
CTR since message string change, though edge case

author: jrbauer
msg: OPENJPA-1605 Correct regression issue with table generation issue in schema generator.  Only the first table name returned in a generic DBMD query was used to populate the schema.  This broke the reverse mapping tool, which uses a generic query by default.

author: rajith
msg: The changes include support the new addressing structure and most items on the list specified in the JIRA.
The following is not included in the commit
1. Add subject as filter in JMS - for exchanges use it as binding key and for queues use it as a selector  - this needs to be thought through. Besides JMS already provides a way to handle this.
2. Implementation of DELETE option. Further testing needs to be done to figure out the impact.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1766 Modified dropCasStatistics() to stop checking if service is top level. Every service has its own instance of perCasStatistics Map and it should remove entries when no longer needed.

author: kgiusti
msg: QPID-2507: drop the userLock before calling exchange->route()
